messages.title: Your postal vote can stop Theresa May’s Brexit wrecking Britain
messages.content: Voting for the Lib Dems sends a powerful message against hard Brexit.

messages.title: ...AND LABOUR IS SUPPORTING THEM!
messages.content: Their extreme Brexit will wreck Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Voting for the Lib Dems sends a powerful message against hard Brexit.

images.caption: Tim Barons with supporters holding a sign against Brexit.
Caricatures of Theresa May and UKIP leader holding a wrecking ball labelled 'Brexit'.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Both the front and the back pages of the leaflet presenting the message against hard Brexit and portraying Labour as a supporter of an extreme Brexit are visible.
